column4: I just installed ubuntu, and it didnt ask me to set a password for root, can someone help me?
Id like to know the root password
because id like to install new firefox and stuff
and says i do not have permission for anything
Then how do i install new firefox
I dont have much experiance with linux console commands
Is there a webpage for displaying all the apps and descriptions for them?
What do i do for programs that arnt avalable with sudo, such as cedega?
what is the format of the download, tgz? rpm?
usually programs are split up if have have libraries and such
so its libraries might be in /usr/lib or /usr/local/lib
while its binary (the executable) would be in /usr/bin or /usr/local/bin
unless its decided that its totally none system software, where some sysadmins put them in /opt (for optional)
open up a terminal, type 'sudo apt-get update' and then enter your own passwd
